text: Barakubaza (yewe Muhamadi) kubyerekeye igihe imperuka izabera. Vuga uti "Mu by’ukuri, ubumenyi bwayo bwihariwe na Nyagasani wanjye. Nta wundi wagaragaza igihe cyayo uretse we. Ibyayo biraremereye mu birere no ku isi. Ntizabageraho itabatunguye. Barakubaza nk’aho uyifiteho ubumenyi. Vuga uti "Mu by’ukuri, ubumenyi bwayo bwihariwe na Allah, nyamara abenshi mu bantu ntibabizi
